titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control - Description

body.p: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control is an ORGANISATION .
The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control is an agency of the European Union that is aimed at strengthening Europe's defences against infectious diseases.
The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control works in three key strategic areas:

div.p: provides evidence for effective and efficient decision-making
supports the response to public health threats.

body.p: For further information on the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control , see the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control website at: About the ECDC .
